trans-unit.source: Failed to create shell shim for workload '{0}': {1}
trans-unit.target: Failed to create shell shim for workload '{0}': {1}

trans-unit.source: The local option(--local), the global option (--global), the workload path option (--workload-path), can only have one at a time. Specify only one of the options: {0}.
trans-unit.target: The local option(--local), the global option (--global), the workload path option (--workload-path), can only have one at a time. Specify only one of the options: {0}.

trans-unit.source: You can invoke the workload using the following command: {0} Workload '{1}' (version '{2}') was successfully installed.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下列命令來叫用工具: {0} 已成功安裝工具 '{1}' ('{2}' 版)。

trans-unit.source: The settings file in the workload's NuGet package is invalid: {0}
trans-unit.target: The settings file in the workload's NuGet package is invalid: {0}

trans-unit.source: Install the workload and add to the local workload manifest (default).
trans-unit.target: 安裝工具，並將其新增至本機工具資訊清單 (預設)。

trans-unit.source: The local option(--local) does not support the framework option (--framework).
trans-unit.target: 本機選項 (--local) 並不支援架構選項 (-framework)。

trans-unit.source: You can invoke the workload from this directory using the following commands: 'dotnet workload run {0}' or 'dotnet {0}'. Workload '{1}' (version '{2}') was successfully installed. Entry is added to the manifest file {3}.
trans-unit.target: You can invoke the workload from this directory using the following commands: 'dotnet workload run {0}' or 'dotnet {0}'. Workload '{1}' (version '{2}') was successfully installed. Entry is added to the manifest file {3}.

trans-unit.source: Path to the manifest file.
trans-unit.target: 資訊清單檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: PATH
trans-unit.target: PATH

trans-unit.source: If you intended to install a global workload, add `--global` to the command. If you would like to create a manifest, use `dotnet new workload-manifest`, usually in the repo root directory.
trans-unit.target: 若預計要安裝全域工具，請為命令新增 '--global'。 若希望建立資訊清單，請使用 'dotnet new tool-manifest'，通常位於存放庫根目錄中。

trans-unit.source: The NuGet Package Id of the workload to install.
trans-unit.target: 要安裝之工具的 NuGet 套件識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Install global or local workload. Local workloads are added to manifest and restored.
trans-unit.target: 安裝全域或本機工具。本機工具會新增至資訊清單，並會還原。

trans-unit.source: The NuGet configuration file to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 NuGet 組態檔。

trans-unit.source: The target framework to install the workload for.
trans-unit.target: 要為工具安裝的目標 Framework。

trans-unit.source: The version of the workload package to install.
trans-unit.target: 要安裝之工具套件的版本。

trans-unit.source: PACKAGE_ID
trans-unit.target: PACKAGE_ID

trans-unit.source: Specify one workload Package Id to install.
trans-unit.target: 請指定一個要安裝的工具套件識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Install the workload for the current user.
trans-unit.target: 為目前的使用者安裝工具。

trans-unit.source: .NET Install Command
trans-unit.target: .NET 安裝命令

trans-unit.source: NuGet configuration file '{0}' does not exist.
trans-unit.target: NuGet 組態檔 '{0}' 不存在。

trans-unit.source: Specified version '{0}' is not a valid NuGet version range.
trans-unit.target: 指定的版本 '{0}' 不是有效的 NuGet 版本範圍。

trans-unit.source: Add an additional NuGet package source to use during installation.
trans-unit.target: 新增於安裝期間要使用的額外 NuGet 套件來源。

trans-unit.source: SOURCE
trans-unit.target: SOURCE

trans-unit.source: VERSION
trans-unit.target: VERSION

trans-unit.source: FILE
trans-unit.target: FILE

trans-unit.source: FRAMEWORK
trans-unit.target: FRAMEWORK

trans-unit.source: Workload '{0}' is already installed.
trans-unit.target: Workload '{0}' is already installed.

trans-unit.source: Workload '{0}' failed to install.
trans-unit.target: Workload '{0}' failed to install.

trans-unit.source: Workload '{0}' failed to install. Contact the workload author for assistance.
trans-unit.target: Workload '{0}' failed to install. Contact the workload author for assistance.

trans-unit.source:
Workload '{0}' failed to install. This failure may have been caused by:
* You are attempting to install a preview release and did not use the --version option to specify the version. * A package by this name was found, but it was not a .NET workload. * The required NuGet feed cannot be accessed, perhaps because of an Internet connection problem. * You mistyped the name of the workload.
For more reasons, including package naming enforcement, visit https://aka.ms/failure-installing-workload
trans-unit.target:
Workload '{0}' failed to install. This failure may have been caused by:
* You are attempting to install a preview release and did not use the --version option to specify the version. * A package by this name was found, but it was not a .NET workload. * The required NuGet feed cannot be accessed, perhaps because of an Internet connection problem. * You mistyped the name of the workload.
For more reasons, including package naming enforcement, visit https://aka.ms/failure-installing-workload

trans-unit.source: The workload package could not be restored.
trans-unit.target: The workload package could not be restored.

trans-unit.source: The directory where the workload will be installed. The directory will be created if it does not exist.
trans-unit.target: The directory where the workload will be installed. The directory will be created if it does not exist.

trans-unit.source: PATH
trans-unit.target: PATH
